properties.property: ifHasItem("helmet", "Miner's") changeSprite("Benjamin", 33) endIf

ifHasItem("helmet", "Miner's") showDialog("__PLAYER__") showMessage("REST IN PEACE YOU FOOL!") else showDialog("Benjamin") #123456789012345678901234 showMessage("YOU THINK YOU CAN COME__", "HERE AND TAKE WHAT'S____", "RIGHTFULLY MINE!________") showDialog("__PLAYER__") showMessage("Calm down Benjamin I'm__", "not taking anything from", "you. The others said you", "were trapped down here._") showDialog("Benjamin") showMessage("HAHA! THAT WAS MY DOING.", "CAN YOU SMELL ALL THOSE_", "CRYSTALS? THEY'RE ALL___", "MINE SO GET OUT NOW!____") showDialog("__PLAYER__") showMessage("I do smell something..._") showDialog("__PLAYER__") showMessage("Oh no!__________________") showDialog("Benjamin") showMessage("LEAVE MY CRYSTALS ALONE_", "AND GET OUT OF HERE!!!__") showDialog("__PLAYER__") showMessage("YOU CAN'T HAVE THEM.____", "EVEN IF I HAVE TO PRY___", "THEM FROM YOUR COLD DEAD", "FINGERS!!!______________") showDialog("Benjamin") showMessage("YOU WANT A PIECE OF ME?_") battle("Benjamin", "cavern", "battleFinal") changeSprite(this, 33) changeEventLocation(this, 8, 6, false) playSoundEffect("getItem", false) givePlayerItem("helmet", "Miner's") showOneLiner("You got a Miner's helmet") waitButtons() playSoundEffect("quake", false) shakeScreen(255, 4) showOneLiner("The walls are caving in.") waitButtons() endIf hideDialog()
hideScreen("maskOut", 1) teleport("maps/town2/mine/floor1.dat", 13, 62, "up") showScreen("instant", 1)

ifHasItem("helmet", "Miner's") ifSwitch(39, OFF) playSoundEffect("getItem", false) showOneLiner("You found some crystals.") givePlayerItem("treasure", "Crystal", 1) else showOneLiner("There's nothing here.") endIf waitButtons() turnSwitchOn(39) else showDialog("Benjamin") showMessage("DON'T TOUCH MY CRYSTALS!") endIf hideDialog()
